column2: §Y"AI Simulation Mode"§! allows you to be treated as AI for the purpose of §Ysome§! of the decisions added by the §M(ED:MP)§! mod, to aid with debugging.
§Y"AI Simulation Mode"§! allows you to be treated as AI for the purpose of §Ysome§! of the decisions added by the §M(ED:MP)§! mod, to aid with debugging.
§Y"MP Simulation Mode"§! allows this game to be treated as if it is multiplayer for the purpose of §Ysome§! of the decisions added by the §M(ED:MP)§! mod, to aid with debugging.

AI Simulation Mode was active in this save when you hosted it for multiplayer.\n\nSince this debug mode would probably cause undesirable effects in a MP game, it has been automatically disabled.
MP Simulation Mode was active in this save when you hosted it for multiplayer.\n\nSince this debug mode would probably cause undesirable effects in a MP game, it has been automatically disabled.
